aboutData.title: Hi There! I’m Shair Ali
aboutData.subtitle: Full Stack Developer & React Expert | Pakistan
aboutData.text: I am a Full Stack Developer and Software Engineer based in Pakistan, specializing in custom digital solutions for clients worldwide. With expertise in React.js, Node.js, React Native, and AI-powered applications, I transform complex ideas into high-performing web and mobile products. From building e-commerce platforms and AI chatbots to deploying production-ready applications on AWS, my work combines clean code, modern design, and real-world impact. If you’re looking to hire a skilled full stack developer or React expert, let’s build something great together.

details.title: Freelance
details.info: Level 1 Seller on Fiverr — Check out my client reviews

services.title: Custom Web Development
services.text: Building modern, scalable, and high-performing web applications using React.js, Node.js, and REST APIs — from MVPs to full-scale production platforms tailored to your business.

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.text: Designing clean, user-friendly, and conversion-focused interfaces with a sharp eye for detail, accessibility, and user journey optimization that drives real engagement.

services.title: E-Commerce Solutions
services.text: Developing full-featured online stores, multi-vendor marketplaces, and secure payment integrations — built for performance, scalability, and maximum conversion.

services.title: Website Hosting & Deployment
services.text: Expert in deploying and hosting websites on AWS virtual machines using Nginx — ensuring fast load times, SSL security, and 99.9% uptime for production applications.

services.title: Desktop Applications
services.text: Building powerful, cross-platform desktop applications tailored to your workflows — from Python GUI tools and data automation scripts to fully custom business software.

services.title: Optimization & Maintenance
services.text: Keeping your websites and apps running at peak performance through speed optimization, SEO tuning, bug fixes, and ongoing technical support.

skillData.title: Technical Skills & Expertise
skillData.text: As a full stack developer based in Pakistan, I deliver end-to-end digital solutions — from React.js web apps and React Native mobile applications to AI chatbots, custom software development, and production-grade AWS deployments with Nginx. My expertise bridges strong backend logic with polished frontend interfaces. Featured projects include the Grand Hotel Selinunte luxury website, a multilingual AI concierge with WhatsApp integration, and Talk — an AI-powered conversational chatbot. Available to hire for freelance and remote contract projects worldwide.

portfolioItems.imageAlt: Grand Hotel Selinunte website preview on laptop and phone
portfolioItems.title: Grand Hotel Selinunte Website
portfolioItems.subTitle: Luxury hotel platform with conversion-focused booking journey
portfolioItems.description: Designed and engineered the official Grand Hotel Selinunte website with a high-performing booking flow, multilingual content strategy, and on-page SEO tuned for hospitality keywords.

portfolioItems.imageAlt: WhatsApp chatbot conversation shown on multiple devices
portfolioItems.title: AI Concierge & Customer Support
portfolioItems.subTitle: 24/7 WhatsApp automation for hospitality
portfolioItems.description: Built an AI-powered concierge that handles reservations, upsells spa services, and automatically responds in five languages while syncing to the hotel PMS.

portfolioItems.imageAlt: Dashboard interface for estimate and invoice automation tool
portfolioItems.title: Estimate & Receipt Generator
portfolioItems.subTitle: Finance automation for hotel operations
portfolioItems.description: Developed a secure internal web portal that auto-calculates stay costs, produces branded quotes in PDF, and emails receipts without manual formatting.

portfolioItems.imageAlt: Talk to Jesus AI chat interface
portfolioItems.title: Talk to Jesus – AI Experience
portfolioItems.subTitle: Faith-based conversational AI with ethical guardrails
portfolioItems.description: Crafted an immersive AI companion that blends curated theology content with empathetic responses, optimized for fast voice synthesis and accessibility.

portfolioItems.imageAlt: Accessible camera mobile interface with filters
portfolioItems.title: Accessible Camera App
portfolioItems.subTitle: Mobile accessibility toolkit for inclusive media
portfolioItems.description: Launched a cross-platform camera experience featuring live color grading, dyslexia-friendly overlays, and preset management for creators with low vision.

portfolioItems.title: NSL Buzzer System
portfolioItems.subTitle: Gamified quiz master for live events
portfolioItems.description: Delivered a real-time quiz control center with HDMI mirroring, latency under 30ms, and responsive scoreboard animations for school tournaments.

portfolioItems.imageAlt: Analytics dashboard for growth marketing automation
portfolioItems.title: Growth Marketing Intelligence
portfolioItems.subTitle: Marketing analytics with predictive scoring
portfolioItems.description: Implemented a marketing intelligence hub that consolidates ads, CRM, and web analytics, surfacing actionable growth recommendations through predictive scoring.

portfolioItems.imageAlt: Portfolio of SaaS landing pages on multiple screens
portfolioItems.title: SaaS Launch System
portfolioItems.subTitle: Component library for rapid SaaS launches
portfolioItems.description: Engineered a design system and deployment pipeline that ships polished SaaS marketing sites with integrated analytics, SEO schema, and localization in minutes.

portfolioItems.imageAlt: Mobile banking experience mockup on smartphone
portfolioItems.title: Fintech Customer Onboarding
portfolioItems.subTitle: Biometric onboarding with risk monitoring
portfolioItems.description: Architected a frictionless onboarding journey for a fintech startup including biometric verification, automated AML checks, and audit-ready compliance logging.

informations.text: He excelled at delivering quickly and the quality of his work is amazing. Highly recommend hiring him for any web development project.

informations.title: harshiamarasena
informations.text: His responsiveness and attention to detail is exceptional. Kudos for the timely delivery and professional communication throughout the project!

informations.title: cronkie
informations.text: This is the second time I’ve worked with Shair and it was just as great! I had a complex request and he worked it out perfectly — went above and beyond every time.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.subTitle: Grand Hotel Selinunte
experience.text: Developed and deployed the official Grand Hotel Selinunte website with a modern booking system, custom React.js frontend, and a fully responsive user experience. Handled end-to-end full stack development including frontend, backend, and AWS Nginx production deployment.

experience.title: AI Chat Support Developer
experience.subTitle: Grand Hotel Selinunte
experience.text: Built and integrated an AI-powered chat support system with WhatsApp integration for Grand Hotel Selinunte. Designed to handle guest queries, booking assistance, and real-time multilingual support — providing a personalized and efficient communication channel.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer — Internal Tools
experience.subTitle: Grand Hotel Selinunte
experience.text: Developed internal tools for the Grand Hotel Selinunte team including a PDF generator, receipt generator, and a smart cost calculator. These React and Node.js-powered tools streamlined workflows, reduced manual effort, and improved overall customer service efficiency.

experience.title: Talk to Jesus — AI Chat Experience
experience.subTitle: Freelance Project
experience.text: Created an innovative AI-driven project called ‘Talk to Jesus’, offering users a unique interactive conversational AI experience. Built with Next.js, Supabase, and OpenAI, blending advanced AI with an empathetic and accessible user interface.

education.title: BS Computer Science — CGPA 3.75
education.subTitle: Riphah International University
education.text: Developed numerous projects including my Final Year Project — a complete social media application featuring image and text posts, public commenting, real-time messaging, friend requests, and core social networking functionalities.

education.title: Diploma in Computer Science
education.subTitle: PAST Institution
education.text: After completing my FSC, I pursued a computer science diploma that ignited my passion for programming and software development. Since then, I’ve never stopped learning, always pushing myself to build better and smarter solutions.

education.title: Always Moving Forward
education.text: Do you know why sharks keep moving? They must, or they won’t survive. In the same way, I believe in continuous growth — always learning, always evolving, and always taking on challenges that make me a better developer.

contactData.title: Contact Info

contactData.text: Looking to hire a full stack developer or React expert? Let’s turn your idea into reality — reach out and let’s build something great together.
